pageContext.claim: “I mean, crooked Hillary spent three or four times more money than us, right?...Crooked Hillary spent three or four times more.”
pageContext.analysis: Clinton did spend more than Trump, but not three or four times more. Clinton's campaign spent $563.4 million and Trump's campaign $325.5 million, so that is less than double, according the Center for Responsive Politics. Trump's claim is still not correct when you add in spending by outside groups.
